history.proof: intros a b p q HltT. unfold pX. hauto use: plusP_inv1, pluspf_is_plusP unfold: pX, pluspf.

ctx: intros a b p q HltT.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) HltT : ltT (A:=A) ltM b a Unable to unify "pluspf q p" with "a :: projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (p, b :: q)) (snd (p, b :: q)) a) (plusp (p, b :: q))".

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) HltT : ltT (A:=A) ltM b a Unable to unify "ltT (A:=A) ltM b a" with "zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b a)".

original: intros a b p q HltT. unfold pX. unfold pluspf. rewrite plusP_inv1 with (a:=b) (b:=a) (p:=q) (q:=p). rewrite plusP_inv3a with (a:=b) (b:=a) (p:=q) (q:=p). - reflexivity. - apply ltT_refl. - apply eqT_symm. apply HltT. - apply ltT_refl.
